title: A Closer Look At Impact Investing
itunes:title: A Closer Look At Impact Investing
description:
Maya Winkelstein, CEO of Open Road Alliance, discusses impact investing. Jason Pride, CIO of Private Wealth at Glenmede, talks markets and inflation. Anurag Rana, Senior Software & IT Services Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses the Intuit, Mailchimp deal. Anand Srinivasan, Senior Semiconductor and Hardware Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, previews Apple's latest event. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
